iti28:2.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ;
iti28:2.2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti28:2.4: Indriyesu aguttadvāratāya ca, bhojane amattaññutāya ca.
iti28:2.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ;
iti28:2.6: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti28:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
